def candidate(n):
    # Perform bitwise AND operation between n and 1
    # The result will be 0 if n is even and non-zero if n is odd
    result = n & 1
    
    # Check the result to determine if n is odd or not
    # If result is not zero, then n is odd, otherwise it's even
    return result != 0
